original_title: PLG: At the Top of the Ramp
overview: Pierre-Luc Gagnon, known as PLG, is the best vertical ramp skater in the world. How did a young kid from Quebec, born in the suburbs of Montreal, became the famous champion he is today? How did he succeed to make a place for himself in the skateboard mecca in California? Talent, hard work, certainly, but also a father and son story.
title: PLG: At the Top of the Ramp
